author: IGN
description:
Follow Linda, as Keeper of the Dark, down an interdimensional rabbit hole to find the source of a dark, unseen power threatening the balance of light and darkness. This installment in the series expands on the lore of the previous games with a spine-chilling horror adventure, set in a Southeast Asian environment.
DreadOut 3 is scheduled for release in 2026. Visit Steam to add the game to your Wishlist.
title: DreadOut 3 - Official Trailer | Horror Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
2025 has been one of the strongest years for anime in ages, building on what is clearly a new Golden Age in the Japanese animation industry. With widening viewership, more access to anime on streaming, and its popularity growing around the globe, there’s more brilliant anime than ever. From the slice-of-life shonen silliness of Sakamoto Days that took Netflix by storm, to the immense success of Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle, which opened to 80 million dollars, 2025 was an epic year for some of our favorite series. But that's a different article (check out our Best Anime Series of 2025 award); instead, we're here to take a look at our most anticipated anime of 2026 – a year that could potentially top 2025 when it comes to iconic releases and anticipated returns. 

Inspired by the massive success and continued cultural impact of anime, 2026 is stacked with unbelievable new series and blockbuster follow-ups, such as: the sophomore season of Frieren: Beyond Journey's End, the emotionally-
title: The Biggest Anime Coming in 2026

author: IGN
description: Despite releasing in just October of 2025, Ghost of Yotei has already had a number of post launch patches with some substantial new additions, including New Game+, quality of life improvements, and more. Here's everything that has been added to Ghost of Yotei since release.
title: Ghost of Yotei - Everything Added Since Launch

author: IGN
description:
Stranger Things is winding down towards it's finale with the release of Season 5, Volume 2 on Netflix. As a special Christmas present for all fans of the Upside Down, The Duffer Brothers and series producer Shawn Levy have gift wrapped some highly anticipated answers to the burning questions raised through the first four seasons. IGN's reviewer Tara Bennett digs into them all, then chats with Clint Gage about whether or not they answered TOO much, how well they doled out the science facts and why caring about the characters is still the most important thing in the fight against Vecna!
 
YouTube Tags: stranger things, stranger things season 5, stranger things finale, stranger things final season, stranger things season 5 volume 2, vecna, duffer brothers, shawn levy, eleven, millie bobby brown, finn wolfhard, will the sorcerer, winona ryder, david harbour, sadie sink, vecna, the upside down, stranger things finale release date
title: Stranger Things Season 5, Volume 2 Review

author: IGN
description: Take a look at gameplay from Taxi Chaos 2 in this trailer for the upcoming arcade racing game. Taxi Chaos 2 will be available on PC on December 23, 2025, and it is coming to PlayStation and Nintendo Switch in early 2026.
title: Taxi Chaos 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the announcement trailer for Steel Bounty, a first-person mech simulation game developed by 
Apoc. Manage your resources, customize your mechs, and command your pilots in a dynamic campaign where every action counts. Experience the ultimate mech simulation where your decisions shape the battlefield and the fate of your company. Steel Bounty is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Steel Bounty - Official Announcement Trailer
